    Reference

    All functions

    appendResults()

    Append a number of results to data

    midpnt() lopnt() hipnt()

    Confidence interval low, mid and high points

    getAB()

    Parameters for a beta distribution

    getAQ()

    Get an arbitrary string for tree calculations

    getLNparms()

    Parameters for a lognormal distribution

    GetNodeLabel()

    two labelling functions to label edges and nodes used by plotter. Labelling utilities

    ilogit()

    Inverse logit function

    logit()

    Logit function

    makeOdinModel()

    Make Odin ODEs from tree

    makePSA()

    Facilitates generating a PSA data.table object from a parameter object

    makeTestData()

    Makes a dummy PSA dataset based on a set of parameters for function testing

    makeTfuns()

    Make functions to evaluate tree

    MergeByName()

    Merge a tree onto another by node name

    MSorg2tree()

    Text file to data.tree tree

    org2LoL()

    Emacs org-mode file to list-of-lists

    org2tree()

    Emacs org-mode file to data.tree tree

    orgAns0()

    Utility function for org2LoL

    parse.parmtable()

    Reading a parameter table and making utility functions

    plotter()

    A plotter for decision tree models

    runningprobs()

    Attach probabilities of reaching each node

    runningprobs0()

    runningprobs0

    savetreeplot()

    Ditch the top of tree on reading

    showAllParmz()

    List the parameters used in the model for use in testing

    showParmz()

    Fetches the parameters used in the model (and prints them)

    simulate()

    Simulate numbers on the tree

    top()

    Drop the top of tree on reading

    tree2file()

    Write a CSV tree with labels

    trm()

    Utility function to trim white space

    txt2tree()

    Make a tree from a tsv
